$.JocodeSlideshowNavigation.name: $.JocodeSlideshowNavigation
$.JocodeSlideshowNavigation.description: The navigation class for a slideshow

props.name: $items
props.description: The navigation items selector, relative to the slideshow container or to the config container, if defined.

props.name: $container
props.description: The selector of the container of the navigation, relative to the slideshow container, defaut, use the slideshow container

props.name: css_await
props.description: Class of items that wait the end of a transition or a loading

props.name: stop_event
props.description: Stop event propagation and default actions

props.name: indexOf
props.description: Function that returns the index of a slide

props.name: onChange
props.description: Custom method called when a slide is changed

props.name: onCancel
props.description: Custom method called when a slide is cancelled

props.name: beforeDraw
props.description: Custom method called before a transition

props.name: afterDraw
props.description: Custom method called after a transition

props.name: beforeScroll
props.description: Custom method called before the scroll
